Key Match Events: Bangladesh lost by four runs in the final over after needing 11 runs to win.
Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller put on a match-winning 75-run partnership.
Taskin Ahmed couldn't convert the crucial final ball for Bangladesh.
Bangladesh's chase was foiled by tight South Africa bowling and key dismissals.
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh had a strong crowd support in New York.
South Africa struggled initially with quick losses but managed to recover through partnerships.
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh deserved better after a strong performance but were unlucky to lose the match.
South Africa's win was seen as a crucial one given their reputation for not winning games they should.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
The article mentioned the growth of the Bangladesh community in New York.
